title: Ruehin
quote: No one has ever entered that forest and lived to tell the tale…

title: Arachas Venom
quote: If substance makes contact with eyes, rinse immediately with cold water, then commence drawing up will.

title: Milaen
quote: The old baron treated poachers mercilessly. Luckily for Milaen, the old baron was dead and his men, desperate outlaws.

title: Derran
quote: Whatever caused this madness must have been terrifying…

title: Reconnaissance
quote: If our scouts don't come back, we turn around. The yokels claim these woods are full o' squirrels - and I don't mean the nut-gatherin' kind.

title: Ciri
quote: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

title: Geralt Igni
quote: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.

title: Geralt of Rivia
quote: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

title: Regis
quote: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.

title: Regis Higher Vampire
quote: He becomes invisible at will. His glance hypnotizes into a deep sleep. He then drinks his fill, turns into a bat and flies off. Altogether uncouth.

title: Triss Merigold
quote: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

title: Villentretenmerth
quote: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.

title: Yennefer
quote: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

title: Zoltan Scoundrel
quote: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.

title: Ciri Dash
quote: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.

title: Geralt Aard
quote: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.

title: Avallac'h Sage
quote: Amongst the free elves were a handful of Aen Saevherne, or Sages. They were an enigma, bordering on a legend.

title: Yennefer Conjurer
quote: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.

title: Dudu
quote: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.

title: Eskel
quote: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…

title: Vesemir
quote: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

title: Lambert
quote: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.

title: Myrgtabrakke
quote: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.

title: Ocvist
quote: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.

title: Olgierd von Everec
quote: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

title: Operator
quote: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.

title: Prize-Winning Cow
quote: Mooooo.

title: Roach
quote: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.

title: Johnny
quote: Life without savoring the sound of surreptitious shananacking is like licking snails through a cloth.

title: Sarah
quote: Little Sarah wants to play!

title: King of Beggars
quote: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.

title: Cyprian Wiley
quote: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo The Cleaver Varese and the King of Beggars.

title: Iris von Everec
quote: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.
